summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 1 and 2, Niesz Plat of West Seattle, being the alley between 41st Avenue Southwest and 42nd Avenue Southwest, from Admiral Way to West College Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14130 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
